member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.AuditSaveChangesInterceptor
member.summary: EF Core interceptor for automatic audit logging. Intercepts SaveChanges operations and creates audit log entries. Implements Constitution Principle III: Security and Auditability by Design.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.CeibaDbContext
member.summary: Main database context for the Ceiba incident reporting system. Extends IdentityDbContext for ASP.NET Identity integration. Configured for PostgreSQL 18 with audit logging interceptor.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.CeibaDbContext.CurrentUserId
member.summary: Current authenticated user ID for audit logging. Set by middleware on each request. NULL for system operations (background jobs, migrations).

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.Configurations.ReporteIncidenciaConfiguration
member.summary: Configuración mínima para Phase 2. Se completará en User Story 1.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.Configurations.SectorConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core configuration for Sector entity. Defines table name, column mappings, indexes, and relationships.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.Configurations.ZonaConfiguration
member.summary: EF Core configuration for Zona entity. Defines table name, column mappings, indexes, and relationships.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.MigrationBackupService
member.summary: T019c: RT-004 Mitigation - Migration backup service Provides programmatic database backup before migrations.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.MigrationBackupService.CreatePreMigrationBackupAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a backup before applying a migration.
member.param: Name of the migration being applied
member.returns: Path to the backup file, or null if backup failed

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.SeedDataService
member.summary: Service to seed initial data into the database. Creates default roles, admin user, and sample catalogs.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Data.SeedDataService.SeedAsync
member.summary: Seeds all initial data. Idempotent - safe to run multiple times.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Identity.IdentityConfiguration
member.summary: Configuración de ASP.NET Identity según requisitos de seguridad. FR-001: Contraseña mínimo 10 caracteres, mayúscula + número FR-005: Timeout de sesión 30 minutos RS-005: Cookies seguras, regeneración de ID de sesión

member.name: T:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Logging.PIIRedactionEnricher
member.summary: RS-003 Mitigation: Serilog enricher to redact PII from log messages. Prevents accidental logging of sensitive information like passwords, emails, IPs.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Logging.PIIRedactionEnricher.PasswordRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
password[\\"\\s:=]+([^\\"\\s,}]+)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [Pp].
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [Ww].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Rr].
○ Match a character in the set [Dd].
○ Match a character in the set [":=\s] greedily at least once.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [^",}\s] atomically at least once.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Logging.PIIRedactionEnricher.EmailRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b
Explanation:
○ Match if at a word boundary.
○ Match a character in the set [%+\-.0-9A-Z_a-z] atomically at least once.
○ Match '@'.
○ Match a character in the set [\-.0-9A-Za-z] greedily at least once.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z|] greedily at least twice.
○ Match if at a word boundary.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Infrastructure.Logging.PIIRedactionEnricher.IPv4Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\b(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\b
Explanation:
○ Match if at a word boundary.
○ Loop exactly 3 times.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match if at a word boundary.

member.summary: Implementation of audit logging service. Provides manual audit logging and query capabilities.

member.name: T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities
member.summary: Helper methods used by generated -derived implementations.

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_defaultTimeout
member.summary: Default timeout value set in , or if none was set.

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_hasTimeout
member.summary: Whether is non-infinite.

member.name: M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.IndexOfAnyDigit(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char})
member.summary: Finds the next index of any character that matches a Unicode digit.

member.name: M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.IsBoundary(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char},System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified index is a boundary.

member.name: M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.IsBoundaryWordChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified index is a boundary word character.
member.remarks: This is the same as \w plus U+200C ZERO WIDTH NON-JOINER and U+200D ZERO WIDTH JOINER.

member.name: M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.IsPostWordCharBoundary(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char},System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified index is a boundary.
member.remarks: This variant is only employed when the previous character has already been validated as a word character.

member.name: M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.IsPreWordCharBoundary(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char},System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified index is a boundary.
member.remarks: This variant is only employed when the subsequent character will separately be validated as a word character.

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.WordCategoriesMask
member.summary: Provides a mask of Unicode categories that combine to form [\w].

member.name: P:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.WordCharBitmap
member.summary: Gets a bitmap for whether each character 0 through 127 is in [\w]

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_asciiExceptDigits
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in "\0\u0001\u0002\u0003\u0004\u0005\u0006\a\b\t\n\v\f\r\u000e\u000f\u0010\u0011\u0012\u0013\u0014\u0015\u0016\u0017\u0018\u0019\u001a\u001b\u001c\u001d\u001e\u001f !\"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ[\\]^_`abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz{|}~\u007f".

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_asciiLettersAndDigitsAndDashDot
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in "-.0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz".
